timeline.message:
Merge branch 'version/1.16.3' of https://github.com/ldtteam/minecolonies into feature/fluidblock

 Conflicts:
	src/main/java/com/minecolonies/coremod/placementhandlers/PlacementHandlerInitializer.java

timeline.bodyText: Does this work nicely? The reason I had the complete override is to make sure the order stays like that.
timeline.author: Raycoms

replies.bodyText: This way it preserves the original order in structurize, so now these mcol specific ones are stacked on top or overriding directly. It's in reverse order from before because its added to the start, not the end. I just tested it with a structure that uses most of those and it appears to work.
replies.author: ShadowProtocol
